name: Wig and Toupee Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell permanently attached or temporary toupees,
wigs, hairpieces, and hair extensions for men and women, and
includes those that provide hair-weaving services.
For merchants providing hair replacement services that require
surgical techniques, use MCC 8099.
